bill.summary:
Repair Our Aging Drives Act of 2017 or the ROAD Act of 2017
This bill amends the Agricultural Act of 2014 to include as forest, rangeland, and watershed restoration services under good neighbor agreements the construction, reconstruction, repair, or restoration of paved or permanent roads or parking areas.
